keyMoments.title: Robin Discovers Shandora
keyMoments.description: Crew archaeologist Nico Robin discovers the legendary City of Gold, Shandora, advancing the crew's understanding of the world's True History.
keyMoments.significance: Major discovery that connects to the crew's larger journey and Robin's personal quest.

keyMoments.title: Nami Receives Upgraded Waver
keyMoments.description: Nami receives a refurbished Waver from Pagaya, powered by a rare Jet Dial, upgrading the crew's mobility options.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew gaining allies and resources in Skypiea to help them in upcoming challenges.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Trapped in Giant Snake
keyMoments.description: Captain Luffy remains trapped inside Nola the giant snake, trying to find his way out.
keyMoments.significance: Separates the captain from the crew during a critical time, adding tension to the arc.
